name: hide-desktop-icons
title: Hide Desktop Icons
description: Simplify hide the icons of the files and folders of your ~/Desktop folder
author: MatteoGauthier

commands.name: hide
commands.title: Hide Desktop Icons
commands.subtitle: Make your desktop clean by hiding icons
commands.description: Disable the visibility of files and folders icons on the desktop

commands.name: show
commands.title: Show Desktop Icons
commands.subtitle: Reveal the icons on your desktop
commands.description: Enable the visibility of files and folders icons on the desktop

commands.name: toggle
commands.title: Toggle Desktop Icons Visibility
commands.subtitle: Toggle desktop icons visibility
commands.description: Switch the visibility of files and folders icons on the desktop
